title: Będziemy mieszkać razem
overview: An emotional story about the fate of Poles and Ukrainians, in the first days and months of the war in Ukraine. Ukrainians who had been driven from their homes in their homeland by the war were welcomed into their homes by Poles. They opened their hearts to refugees whose lives were in ruins. This is a story about the power of love, hope and friendship. About the fact that we can only survive together.
